title: US Open tennis 2025: Iga Swiatek, Jannik Sinner and Naomi Osaka in action on day five – live
summary: Daniel Harris provides live updates from the second round of an event in New York. Stay tuned for ongoing coverage and insights. Follow for continuous reporting on developments.

title: Champions League draw: 2025-26 group phase fixtures revealed – live
summary: Billy Munday will provide live updates on the announcement of this season's group phase fixtures. Stay tuned for real-time coverage and insights. Follow along for all the latest developments.

title: Trump’s border czar says there will be a ‘ramp up’ of Ice operations in Democratic-led cities – US politics live
summary: Tom Homan announced that ICE will enhance its operations in Chicago and other Democratic-leaning cities following Labor Day. He defended the president's recent actions in Washington, D.C. Homan's comments reflect a broader strategy to intensify immigration enforcement in urban areas.

title: Make Drax wait for its next subsidy deal. An FCA investigation is serious | Nils Pratley
summary: Ministers are advised to seek the regulator's input before committing an additional £1.8 billion of public funds. This caution highlights concerns about financial accountability and oversight. The recommendation aims to ensure informed decision-making regarding public expenditure.

title: Ann McManus obituary
summary: The television writer known for creating the popular drama series "Waterloo Road" has passed away. He was also a co-founder of Shed Productions, a company that contributed to various successful TV shows. His work has left a significant impact on the television industry.
